attributes.action: Protest against the Ukraine "Gay Propaganda" Bill
attributes.additional_details:
The Ukrainan Government is on the verge of implementing to stop "gay propaganda" - which is meant to include gay pride marches, showings of affection between gay couples such as holding hands in public or any positive depiction of gay people - even films like Philadelphia and Brokeback Mountain.

This is a disgusting attack on a basic human right to love whoever you choose to do so and should be stopped.

I want the government to work to overturn this legislation and co-operate with other governments worldwide to put a united front against homophobia and protect a wide section of our society.

Please sign, and encourage your friends, family and colleagues to do so, if you too believe this needs to be stopped.
